text.style: font-family:Arial; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: returns the specific yield of a cell in the top layer based on the hydrogeologic units intersected by the cell and the SYTP parameter values.
is used to help display an approximation of how the HUF geometry and parameters ultimately control the specific yield of the cells.
can only be used in the formulas for data sets.
